original_text: People buried the bones of Saul and Jonathan in the grave of Saul's father, Kish. The grave was in Zela, in land that belonged to Benjamin's tribe. The king had told them everything that they should do. After they had done all these things, God answered their prayers for their country.
korean_text: 사울과 그의 아들 요나단의 뼈와 함께 베냐민 땅 셀라에서 그의 아버지 기스의 묘에 장사하되 모두 왕의 명령을 따라 행하니라 그 후에야 하나님이 그 땅을 위한 기도를 들으시니라

sentences.original_text: People buried the bones of Saul and Jonathan
in the grave of Saul's father, Kish
in land that belonged to Benjamin's tribe
The king had told them everything
After they had done all these things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이 모든 일을 한 후에
